data.eml:eml: Synonymizing Microtomus sticheli Costa Lima, 1935 under M. tibialis Stichel, 1926 and redescription of the species (Heteroptera: Reduviidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coscaron, María Del Carmen, Melo, María Cecilia, Cuello, Nora (2003): Synonymizing Microtomus sticheli Costa Lima, 1935 under M. tibialis Stichel, 1926 and redescription of the species (Heteroptera: Reduviidae). Zootaxa 288: 1-6, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156906
